author: xOmniCloudx

text: I really liked the soundtracks to Phantasy Star IV, Shining Force, Shining in the Darkness, Y's III, Streets of Rage II, Contra: Hard Corps, Ristar, Comix Zone, Castlevania: Bloodlines, Landstalker, Light Crusader, Rocket Knight Adventures, Gunstar Heroes, Sword of Vermillion, Alien Soldier, Langrisser II, TMNT: Tournament Fighters, and Street Fighter II should be a good start for you. :)
author: parker469a

text: Some of the best Genesis soundtracks I would say are the Streets of Rage soundtracks, Thunder Force 3 and 4 (4 has one of the best of all time!) Rocket Knight Adventures, Contra Hard Corps, etc. The Genesis definitely had more of a harsh, ass kicking sound compared to the SNES!
author: SQGTDev Fun Channel!

text: One of my favorite Genesis soundtracks. I usually prefer the SNES sound, but when composers knew how to get a rocking sound out of the Sega console, it was awesome (like this or the Yuzo Koshiro games). I actually prefer most of this version's music than the SNES version, with some expections like Stage 1-3 (Best VGM 489).
author: SupraDarky
